projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: One of the more memorable things I've made. A website tracking salas data between stores with the ability to add stores and their data on the fly.

projects.title: codeHang
projects.description: A project I made with some friends. A hangman style game focused around front end development terms.

projects.title: Final Placeholder
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
